Text:
Update :

The DVD's English subtitles (.sub) were a mess.

The subtitles included in this movie file were created by myself with some laborious editing.

There were some minor errors!!!

I have posted an improved version here :
http://pastebay.net/1151235

And here :
http://subscene.com/subtitles/barbara-2012

File deleted!.
Is this a joke??
To what file are you referring, Naimtpb?
Could you please post the German Subs as well? Thankyou

There were no German subs on the dvd.
Germany doesn't 'do' subs, they create an industry for one tiny country and 'do' audio dubs.
Sorry.

Not sure which DVD you have but the official dvd has "Untertitel für Gehörlose: Deutsch"

I live in Germany. Some DVDs have german subtitles, some of them don't.

Not sure which dvd you have, but the official dvd has german subtitles for the hearing-impaired "Untertitel für Gehörlose: Deutsch"

I live in Germany. Some DVDs have german subtitles and some of them don't.

I always try to include everything in my rips.
The source is the Indigo DVD, R2, DVD9.
The only subtitles are English and Turkish.
No closed caption, no German.
Web search > B008BPR75C
No Deutsch subtitles.
Also it should be noted there was no 5:1 audio as advertised, or I would have included it.

Thanks for your feedback!

(It seems that Indigo released a "Special Edition" that has the german subs)
thanks for the upload :) I also enjoyed reading the comments :D
